nodes.text: Elyhek Rue was a human male who served as a pilot in the Alliance to Restore the Republic as a member of Red Squadron during the Galactic Civil War. He went into the X-wing training simulator room inside the Massassi Temple on Yavin 4 along with Biggs Darklighter, Bren Quersey, Wenton Chan, and Wedge Antilles while Col Takbright was in there. Takbright became mad when Rue mistook him for Wedge. He was grounded for the Battle of Yavin and watched the battle with Takbright and the other grounded pilots.
